# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a notification presentation options object using the specified raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw unsigned integer value for the notification presentation options.
title: init(rawValue:)
